description: This is the main HTML source file for a web-based database viewer UI, containing HTML structure, embedded CSS styles, and JavaScript code managing fetching, displaying, and interacting with database data.

methods.name: loadDatabases
methods.description: Fetches list of databases and populates the sidebar

methods.name: toggleDatabase
methods.description: Expands or collapses the database's table list

methods.name: loadTables
methods.description: Fetches tables for a selected database

methods.name: loadTableData
methods.description: Fetches and displays data for a selected table

methods.name: renderTable
methods.description: Renders the table of data into HTML

methods.name: renderCell
methods.description: Creates HTML for a cell, handling formatting and expandability for large objects or text

methods.name: expandCell
methods.description: Expands or collapses cell content for long text or objects
